title: Gravel Bolivia: The Artisan Bike at Sea Otter with Double Top Tubes and a Raised Down Tube
content:
The Gravel Bolivia is both beautiful to look at and perfectly balanced in contradictions. Stirring discussion is the point.

Read the full article at Gravel Bolivia: The Artisan Bike at Sea Otter with Double Top Tubes and a Raised Down Tube on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
